Package com.authenticket.authenticket.service.impl

Class AdminServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.authenticket.authenticket.service.impl.AdminServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdminService, org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
@Service public class AdminServiceImpl extends Object implements AdminService, org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
This class provides the implementation of the `AdminService` and `UserDetailsService` interfaces. It is responsible for handling admin-related operations and authentication using Spring Security.

    • findAdminById

      public Optional<AdminDisplayDto> findAdminById(Integer adminId)
      Find an admin user by their unique identifier and convert it into a display DTO.
      Specified by:
      findAdminById in interface AdminService
      Parameters:
      adminId - The unique identifier of the admin user.
      Returns:
      An `Optional` containing the `AdminDisplayDto` of the admin user if found, or an empty `Optional` if not.

      Update an admin user's information.
      Specified by:
      updateAdmin in interface AdminService
      Parameters:
      newAdmin - The updated admin user information.
      Returns:
      The `AdminDisplayDto` representing the updated admin user, or `null` if the user was not found.

    • loadUserByUsername

      public org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails loadUserByUsername(String email) throws org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException
      Load a user's details using their email address.
      Specified by:
      loadUserByUsername in interface org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user.
      Returns:
      The user details (a `UserDetails` instance) if found.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException - if the user is not found.
